tool_description: An API showing all the latest Gaming news around the world
name: Gaming News
title: Gaming News

api_list.name: Get Individual Publisher News
api_list.description:
Gets News about a specific Gaming Publisher.

Available Publishers (36):
- rockstar (Rockstar Games)
- ubisoft
- valve
- activision
- blizzard
- bethesda
- ea (Electronic Arts)
- taketwo (Take-Two)
- bandai
- epic (Epic Games)
- nintendo
- capcom
- squareenix (Square Enix)
- playstation
- microsoft
- xbox
- riot
- 2k
- amazon (Amazon Games)
- cdprojektred (CD Projekt RED)
- codemasters
- crytek
- gameloft
- konami
- mojang
- supercell
- tencent
- origin
- respawn
- niantic
- naughtydog (Naughty Dog)
- treyarch
- frontier
- raven
- infinityward
- sledgehammer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gaming-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/rockstar"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gaming-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gaming-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{publisherid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gaming-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about gaming publisher from all over the world.
